alfredsnippet.snippet:
"Now, in the debased discussions that pass for critical debate, science is flaunted as if it had in fact achieved its own ideal, as if it really is as 'rational' as its best exponents aspire to be. That is a mistake in itself."

- The privatisation of science, Colin Tudge, New Statesman, 2004/04/30
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - Science is Flaunted as if it Had In Fact Achieved Its Own Ideal
